titles.ar: باب مَنْ أَوْصَى بِشَيْ‏ءٍ مِنْ مَالِهِ
titles.en: Chapter 25 – One who bequeaths with ‘something’ from his wealth

titles.ar: باب مَنْ أَوْصَى بِشَيْ‏ءٍ مِنْ مَالِهِ
titles.en: Chapter 25 – One who bequeaths with ‘something’ from his wealth

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَمْرٍو عَنْ جَمِيلٍ عَنْ أَبَانٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ ( عليه السلام ) أَنَّهُ سُئِلَ عَنْ رَجُلٍ أَوْصَى بِشَيْ‏ءٍ مِنْ مَالِهِ فَقَالَ الشَّيْ‏ءُ فِي كِتَابِ عَلِيٍّ ( عليه السلام ) وَاحِدٌ مِنْ سِتَّةٍ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Abu Abdullah, from Muhamamd Bin Amro, from Jameel, from Aban, 
(It has been narrated) from Ali<sup>asws</sup> Bin Al-Husayn<sup>asws</sup> having been asked about a man who bequeathed with ‘something’ from his wealth. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The ‘something’ in the Book of Ali<sup>asws</sup> is one from six (1/6)’.

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنِ ابْنِ فَضَّالٍ أَوْ غَيْرِهِ عَنْ جَمِيلٍ عَنْ أَبَانٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ سُئِلَ عَنْ رَجُلٍ أَوْصَى بِشَيْ‏ءٍ مِنْ مَالِهِ قَالَ الشَّيْ‏ءُ فِي كِتَابِ عَلِيٍّ ( عليه السلام ) مِنْ سِتَّةٍ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Isa, from Ibn Fazaal, or someone else, from Jameel, from Aban, 
(It has been narrated) from Ali<sup>asws</sup> Bin Al-Husayn<sup>asws</sup>, said, ‘He<sup>asws</sup> was asked about a man who bequeathed with ‘something’ from his wealth. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The ‘something’ in the Book of Ali<sup>asws</sup> is (one) from six (1/6)’.
